original_text: We will also send another believer along with the other men. This man has always shown us that we can trust him. He has wanted to help in many different ways. Now that he is very sure about you, he wants to help even more.
korean_text: 또 그들과 함께 우리의 한 형제를 보내었노니 우리는 그가 여러 가지 일에 간절한 것을 여러 번 확인하였거니와 이제 그가 너희를 크게 믿으므로 더욱 간절하니라

sentences.original_text: We will also send another believer
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 또 다른 믿는 사람을 보낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: This man has always shown us
Now that he is very sure about you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 당신에 대해 매우 확신하므로

sentences.original_text: he wants to help even more
